description: A short trail linking Trepanier Regional Park with the Pincushion trails.  Soon it is planned to be a loop back to the start.  Currently under construction, and the trail is still in need of some work to make it smooth.
directions: Head to Trepanier Regional Park just off of Hwy 97C.  There is plenty of parking there.  Once you cross the bridge stay to the right, the trail then turns left before the highway.
title: Trepanier XC
